components.name: Playwright MCP Server
components.description: The core server that processes requests for browser automation and serves structured accessibility data.

components.name: MCP Clients
components.description: Various clients (e.g., VS Code, Claude, Cursor) that interact with the Playwright MCP server to perform browser automation tasks.

components.name: Playwright Library
components.description: A library that provides the underlying functionality for browser automation and accessibility tree access.

data_flows.description: Clients send requests to the server for browser automation tasks, including commands and parameters.
The server responds with structured accessibility data and results of the automation tasks.

trust_boundaries.name: Client-Server Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the MCP clients and the Playwright MCP server, where data is exchanged.
